content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Feb 2019I'm looking to start investing using Robo-advisors. Should I make a initial large lump sum deposit, or monthly deposits?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 16 May 2019If you're just starting out and prefer to have liquidity for other things, then you can do monthly deposits.0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 26 Feb 2019If your intention is to keep invested for a long time frame(10, 20, 30 years), there isn't much difference. 0 comments0
